channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It's the deadliest year for ICE in decades. As detentions rise, the trend may continue
item.description: There have been at least 20 deaths in ICE custody in 2025, the deadliest year since 2004. As the agency is ramping up hiring and increasing detentions...

item.title: Court to rule on troop deployment. And, a new Pentagon press corps emerges

item.title: Eric Adams Will Endorse Andrew Cuomo for NYC Mayor
item.description: In a stunning reversal, Mayor Eric Adams will endorse former Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo for mayor, in hopes of slowing the momentum of Zohran Mamdani, the D...

item.title: The Democratic Party Is Getting Too Rich to Win
item.description: Democrats used to be known as the party of the poor and the working class. Two decades of federal income data show how that changed.

item.title: With Dire Picture of a Mamdani Mayoralty, Cuomo Plays to Voters’ Fears

item.title: NBA coach Chauncey Billups, player Terry Rozier arrested in FBI gambling probe
item.description: Rozier, a guard for the Miami Heat, was investigated by the NBA in 2023 in connection with suspicious gambling activity on a game that he exited early...

item.title: She Worked on Tsunami Alerts. Then She Was Fired.
item.description: “I always wanted to be a public servant and do science for the good of the people,” said Corina Allen, who lost her job at NOAA.

item.title: U.S. May Seek United Nations Mandate for Gaza Security Force, Rubio Says
item.description: Vice President JD Vance spoke from Israel, as he wrapped up a visit aimed at shoring up a fragile cease-fire between Israel and Hamas.

item.title: Oil Price Jumps on Trump’s Russia Sanctions
item.description: Traders are pondering whether the United States and its allies are finally getting serious about restricting Russian energy.
